jobDescription: Low Voltage Technician  Currently hiring for a Low Voltage Technician in the Reno Area. - Lead technician and apprentices- with experience in the commercial environment. Qualified candidates will send an updated resume for consideration.  Please send your resume to jasmine.s@outsource.net for consideration. Job Duties : Pulling CAT 5E or CAT 6 cable in a commercial environment  Installing support structures (ladder rack, racks, j-hooks)  IP Camera installation, WAP installation, Card Access Systems Testing,  Troubleshooting & Terminating phone jacks  Dressing and terminating distribution frames Preferred Qualifications: Able to read, follow and understand Blue prints.  Being able to lift up to 70lbs.  Your own basic telecom tools including punch downs, snips, wire strippers, cordless drill etc( a list of required tools will be provided)  Technician must be capable of interacting with the client and relaying important information to the project manager.  Strong work ethic, punctuality and attendance, excellent customer service and interpersonal skills Compensation: Peridium, hotel pay, and mileage as needed  Option to enroll in Medical, Dental, Vision  Hourly pay ranging from $16-30/hr  Weekly pay  Referral Bonuses for Low voltage and Electrical employees  Please send your resume to jasmine.s@outsource.net for consideration.
